description: This file defines a ReasoningTools class that provides step-by-step reasoning and analysis tools for an agent-based system. It includes methods for internal thought processing and result analysis, along with detailed instructions and examples for usage.

classes.name: ReasoningTools
classes.description: A toolkit class providing step-by-step reasoning and analysis methods for agents, including internal thought and result evaluation functionalities.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the ReasoningTools with configurable options for instructions, few-shot examples, and which tools to include.

methods.name: think
methods.description: Allows the agent to record internal thoughts, track reasoning steps, and store them in session state.

methods.name: analyze
methods.description: Enables the agent to analyze results from reasoning steps, determine next actions, and record the analysis in session state.
